events.message: The insured has reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection early this morning.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to mentions of car and collision in the report.
An agent from the motor claims team has been assigned to handle the reported auto accident claim.
Acknowledgement of receipt of the auto accident claim has been sent to the claimant via email.
The claimant has been requested to submit police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license copy.
Claimant has submitted all requested documents including police report and images of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle accident has commenced with initial vehicle inspection.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault in the collision based on evidence obtained.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs and vehicle downtime for the claimant.
The claimant provided positive feedback appreciating the quick response and clear communication.
The claim has been officially approved after review of all documentation and investigation results.
Payment to cover approved damages has been issued and transferred to the claimant’s bank account.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed following the successful settlement and payment issuance.
